1101011101011000 1011111100001000 0 -> sum: 1001011001100000, cout: 1
1111011000110101 1001100111101010 1 -> sum: 1001000000100000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
